sqlMap.select:
select * from (select rownum rownum_ , AA.* from ( select * from jat_out_vendor_head a where exists (select 1 from jas_bd_emp_org b where a.org_id = b.orgid and b.empid = #userId#) a.STATUS != 8 and a.STATUS != 0 a.DOTYPE = #doType#
$_q_sql$ order by a.CREATE_DATE desc ) AA ) where rownum_ >= $start$ and rownum <= $limit$
select count(1) from jat_out_vendor_head a where exists (select 1 from jas_bd_emp_org b where a.org_id = b.orgid and b.empid = #userId#) a.STATUS != 8 and a.STATUS != 0 a.DOTYPE = #doType# $_q_sql$
select count(1) from jat_out_vendor_head a where a.status = 8 and a.dotype = 0 and nvl(a.is_check, 0) = 0
select count(1) from jat_out_vendor_head a where a.status = 8 and a.dotype = 0 and nvl(a.is_bill, 0) = 0
select count(1) from jat_out_vendor_head a where a.status = 8 and a.dotype = 2 and nvl(a.is_check, 0) = 0

select a.*,s.stylename,aa.analysis_arange_code,s.styleitemclass,s.stylemiddleclass,s.styleornaclass, s.isbiggraph from ic_mater_active a left join jas_bd_style s on s.styleid=a.style_id left join jas_bd_analysis_arange aa on aa.analysis_arange_id=a.alaysis_id where a.orna_code = #code# a.orna_barcode = #code#
select * from jat_out_vendor_head a where a.billid = #value#
select * from jat_out_vendor_head a where a.billno = #value#
select finance from JAT_BASIC_BILLNO_RULE WHERE BILL_CODE=#value#
select wm_concat(t.item_class_id) item_class_id from jat_basic_material_item t where t.material_type=#value#
select t.pur_unit from jat_basic_material_item t where t.material_type=#materialType# and t.item_class_id=#itemClass#

select a.*,s.stylename,s.ISBIGGRAPH ,aa.analysis_arange_code from jat_out_vendor_line a left join jas_bd_style s on s.styleid=a.style_id left join jas_bd_analysis_arange aa on aa.analysis_arange_id=a.alaysis_id where a.billid=#value#

select nvl(max(LOSS_MONEY), 0) + #payMoney# money from jat_cash_money_account t where t.voder_id = #voderId# and exists (select voder_id from (select voder_id, max(mr_id) mr_id from jat_cash_money_account group by voder_id) tt where t.mr_id = tt.mr_id and t.voder_id = tt.voder_id)
select ph.headid "headid", ph.billno "billno" from jat_pur_purchase_head ph where ph.vendor_id = #voderId# and ph.status <> 8

select aa.ANALYSIS_ARANGE_CODE "alaysisId",m.orna_dsc "ornaDsc",m.orna_code "ornaCode", m.STONE_NOW_NUM "nowQty",m.all_qty "allQty", m.color_grade_grade_id "colorGradeGradeId", m.clean_grade_id "cleanGradeId", m.main_shape_id "mainShapeId",m.color_id "colorId",m.quality_id "qualityId", m.ags_cert "agsCert",m.hrd_cert "hrdCert",m.igi_cert "igiCert",m.gia_cert "giaCert", m.ident_id "identId" from ic_mater_noactive m inner join jas_bd_analysis_arange aa on aa.analysis_arange_id=m.alaysis_id inner join jat_out_vendor_line bb on bb.orna_code = m.orna_code where bb.billid=#value# order by bb.lineid

select aa.ANALYSIS_ARANGE_CODE "alaysisId",m.orna_dsc "ornaDsc",m.orna_code "ornaCode", m.STONE_NOW_NUM "nowQty",m.all_qty "allQty", m.color_grade_grade_id "colorGradeGradeId", m.clean_grade_id "cleanGradeId", m.main_shape_id "mainShapeId",m.color_id "colorId",m.quality_id "qualityId", m.ags_cert "agsCert",m.hrd_cert "hrdCert",m.igi_cert "igiCert",m.gia_cert "giaCert", m.ident_id "identId" from ic_mater_active m inner join jas_bd_analysis_arange aa on aa.analysis_arange_id=m.alaysis_id inner join jat_out_vendor_line bb on bb.orna_code = m.orna_code where bb.billid=#value# order by bb.lineid
sqlMap.insert:
select Jat_Out_Vendor_head_seq.nextval as headId from dual
insert into jat_out_vendor_head(billid,billno,org_id,vendor_id,sale_money,sum_count,sum_weight,sum_grains,sum_money,sum_cost,status,create_id,create_date,memo,update_date,update_id,stock_id,dotype,doDate,MATERIAL_TYPE,PUR_BILLNO) values(#headId#,#billNo#,#orgId#,#vendorId#,#saleMoney#,#sumCount#,#sumWeight#,#sumGrains#,#sumMoney#,#sumCost#,#status#,#createId#,#createDate#,#memo#,#updateDate#,#updateId#,#stockId#,#doType#,#doDate#,#materialType#,#purBillNo#)
sqlMap.update: update jat_out_vendor_head a set a.update_date = #date#, a.update_id = #userid#, a.status = #status# where a.billid = #headid#
sqlMap.insert:
select Jat_Out_Vendor_Line_seq.nextval as lineId from dual
insert into jat_out_vendor_line(lineid,billid,item_class_id,orna_class_id,styleitemclass,stylemiddleclass,styleornaclass,style_id,alaysis_id,orna_code ,orna_barcode,orna_dsc,unit_id,now_qty,all_qty,grains,main_weight,part_weight,is_muti_part,is_dbl_label ,pos_cost,pos_money,status,memo,create_date,create_id,update_date,update_id,MAIN_COLOR_GRADE_ID,CLEAN_ID,IS_PSALE) values(#lineId#,#headId#,#itemClassId#,#ornaClassId#,#styleItemClass#,#styleMiddleClass#,#styleOrnaClass#,#styleId#,#alaysisId#,#ornaCode#,#ornaBarCode#,#ornaDsc#, #unitId#,#nowQty#,#allQty#,#grains#,#mainWeight#,#partWeight#,#isMutiPart#,#isDblLabel#, #posCost#,#posMoney#,#status#,#memo#,#createDate#,#createId#,#updateDate#,#updateId#,#colorId#,#cleanId#,#isPSale#)
insert into ic_mater_noactive select * from ic_mater_active a where a.orna_code=#value# and a.state=901

insert into ic_mater_active(ID,ORNA_CODE,ORNA_BARCODE,ORNA_DSC,STOCK_ORG_ID,STOCK_ID,GROUPS,STYLE_ID,NOW_QTY,ALL_QTY,ITEM_CLASS_ID,ORNA_CLASS_ID,ALAYSIS_ID,STYLE_NO_ID,QUALITY_ID,TAG_TYPE,SALE_UNIT_ID,BUY_UNIT_ID,PRIC_UNIT_ID,PRICE_ATTR_GROUP,STATE,BASIC_PRICE,REBATE,REBATE_TYPE,STORE_UNIT_COST,REAL_UNIT_COST,POS_AMOUNT,REAL_TOTAL_COST,STORE_TOTAL_COST,PRODUCTDATE,OLD_RESPONSIBLE,STORE_COLOR,COM_STORE,STORAGEDATE,TOSHOPDATE,NUCLEAR_BILL_ID,MAIN_SHAPE_ID,COLOR_ID,MAIN_WEIGHT,PART_WEIGHT,PART_CONTENT,CLEAN_ID,MAIN_COLOR_GRADE_ID,QLTY_ID,STONE_TOTAL_NUM,STONE_NOW_NUM,SPECIAL_WORK_PRICE,STRING_WORK_PRICE,SUMMARY_ID,IS_CONSIGN,IS_CUSTOM,HANDOVER_BILL_ID,MANUFACTURER_ID,SUPPLIER_ID,ZODIAC,IDENT_ID,FACTORY_STYLE_ID,STORAGE_PRIC_ATTR_GROUP,REBATE_AMOUNT,SPECIAL_WEIGHT,CUT_ID,CUT_WIDE_SCALE,CUT_DEEP_SCALE,SYMMETRY_ID,POLISHINE_ID,FLUORESCENCE_ID,WAISTLINE_ID,VERTEX_ID,HRD_CERT,GIA_CERT,IGI_CERT,BRACKETCOLOR_ID,UPDATEDATE,WEAR_ID,STYLE_TYPE_ID,IS_MUTI_PART,CURRENCY_PRICE,CURRENCY_MONEY,CURRENCY_TAX,TAX,TOTAL_CURRENCY_TAX,SIZE_ID,MAIN_NUM,PART_NUM,MATERIAL_ID,ORG_ID,USE_QTY_TEMP,AGS_CERT,REAL_COST,CUSTOMIZE_NO,IS_DBL_LABEL,BILL_CODE,BILL_NO,IS_MATERIAL,MATERIAL_TYPE,COLOR_GRADE_GRADE_ID,CLEAN_GRADE_ID) select ID,ORNA_CODE,ORNA_BARCODE,ORNA_DSC,STOCK_ORG_ID,STOCK_ID,GROUPS,STYLE_ID,NOW_QTY,ALL_QTY,ITEM_CLASS_ID,ORNA_CLASS_ID,ALAYSIS_ID,STYLE_NO_ID,QUALITY_ID,TAG_TYPE,SALE_UNIT_ID,BUY_UNIT_ID,PRIC_UNIT_ID,PRICE_ATTR_GROUP,900,BASIC_PRICE,REBATE,REBATE_TYPE,STORE_UNIT_COST,REAL_UNIT_COST,POS_AMOUNT,REAL_TOTAL_COST,STORE_TOTAL_COST,PRODUCTDATE,OLD_RESPONSIBLE,STORE_COLOR,COM_STORE,STORAGEDATE,TOSHOPDATE,NUCLEAR_BILL_ID,MAIN_SHAPE_ID,COLOR_ID,MAIN_WEIGHT,PART_WEIGHT,PART_CONTENT,CLEAN_ID,MAIN_COLOR_GRADE_ID,QLTY_ID,STONE_TOTAL_NUM,STONE_NOW_NUM,SPECIAL_WORK_PRICE,STRING_WORK_PRICE,SUMMARY_ID,IS_CONSIGN,IS_CUSTOM,HANDOVER_BILL_ID,MANUFACTURER_ID,SUPPLIER_ID,ZODIAC,IDENT_ID,FACTORY_STYLE_ID,STORAGE_PRIC_ATTR_GROUP,REBATE_AMOUNT,SPECIAL_WEIGHT,CUT_ID,CUT_WIDE_SCALE,CUT_DEEP_SCALE,SYMMETRY_ID,POLISHINE_ID,FLUORESCENCE_ID,WAISTLINE_ID,VERTEX_ID,HRD_CERT,GIA_CERT,IGI_CERT,BRACKETCOLOR_ID,UPDATEDATE,WEAR_ID,STYLE_TYPE_ID,IS_MUTI_PART,CURRENCY_PRICE,CURRENCY_MONEY,CURRENCY_TAX,TAX,TOTAL_CURRENCY_TAX,SIZE_ID,MAIN_NUM,PART_NUM,MATERIAL_ID,ORG_ID,USE_QTY_TEMP,AGS_CERT,REAL_COST,CUSTOMIZE_NO,IS_DBL_LABEL,'','',IS_MATERIAL,MATERIAL_TYPE,COLOR_GRADE_GRADE_ID,CLEAN_GRADE_ID from ic_mater_noactive a where a.orna_code=#value#
sqlMap.update: update ic_mater_active a set a.state=#state#,a.BILL_CODE=#billType#,a.BILL_NO=#billNo# where a.orna_code=#ornaCode#
update JAT_CASH_PROD_ACCOUNT a set a.is_checked=1 where a.bill_no=#value#
update jat_out_vendor_head set sale_money=#saleMoney#, is_check = 1, update_date=#updateDate#, update_id=#updateId# where billid = #headId#
